title: "Exploring Everyday Trance States and Their Characteristics"
first_phrase: In the previous passage, we explored the topic of trance, which refers to a state of immersion in which we find ourselves without realizing it. This state also involves a specific subjective aspect, as well as the objective alteration of reality. Now, we will delve deeper into the most common daily trances we experience. These include dissociation, positive hallucination, progression into the future, daily imaginations, and hypermnesia. Understanding these phenomena in comparison to hypnotic states will allow us to better comprehend these experiences.
